claims.assertion: Success UI triggered without awaiting network call

gaps.description: This ships lies. Users see success even when the request never completed.
gaps.suggestion: const res = await fetch(...); if (!res.ok) throw new Error('Request failed');

claims.assertion: Optimistic update without rollback on failure

gaps.description: State is updated before network call completes, but there's no rollback if the request fails. Users see stale/incorrect data.
gaps.suggestion: Add a catch block that reverts the state to previous value on failure.
